# colors.js

## get color and style in your node.js console

<img src="https://github.com/Marak/colors.js/raw/master/screenshots/colors.png"/>

## Installation

    npm install colors

## colors and styles!

### text colors

  - black
  - red
  - green
  - yellow
  - blue
  - magenta
  - cyan
  - white
  - gray
  - grey

### background colors



  - bgBlack
  - bgRed
  - bgGreen
  - bgYellow
  - bgBlue
  - bgMagenta
  - bgCyan
  - bgWhite

### styles

  - reset
  - bold
  - dim
  - italic
  - underline
  -
